name: Trip the Ark Fantastic
storyline: You are Charles, a hedgehog scholar with a mission. You and your companions will embark on a journey of discovery into the far, unexplored reaches of the world. It is the King’s hope that you will be able to prove the existence of the “Ark”, a mythical vessel that has always formed the basis of the kings’ right to rule and thus stop the brewing civil war.
summary: Trip the Ark Fantastic is a 2D story-driven adventure set in the Animal Kingdom, a fable world filled with alluring vistas, colorful characters and, unexpectedly, scholarly debates.
